adjective.description: Causing the contraction of body tissues, typically of the skin.
Sharp or severe in manner or style.
examples: her astringent words had their effect

noun.description: A substance that causes the contraction of body tissues, typically used to protect the skin and to reduce bleeding from minor abrasions.

origin: Mid 16th century: from French, from Latin astringent- pulling tight, from the verb astringere, from ad- towards + stringere bind, pull tight.
